dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains statistics on population, household assets, employment, food security, education, migration, health care use, and childbirth, from the 2010 Mexico Population and Housing Census (Censo de Población y Vivienda 2010). The original questionnaire and other supporting documentation for this census is included with this download.  These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
dc_creator_sm: Instituto Nacional de Estadística, Geografía e Informática (Mexico)
